mapper.select: SELECT A.no, A.title, A.contents, date_format(A.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDate, A.category_no as categoryNo FROM post A INNER JOIN category B ON A.category_no = B.no WHERE B.blog_id = #{id } ORDER BY A.reg_date DESC
